content.type: To all mobile and fixed networks in Switzerland and Liechtenstein. Calls to business, short-dial and special numbers are chargeable.

Highspeed Up- and Download Speed

In Swisscom Public WLAN up to 20 Mbit/s download and 2 Mbit/s upload.

100 MB surfing per year

Excludes value-added services and special numbers. The inclusive units cannot be used on ships and ferries and on flights.

Surfing and calling on one extra device

Up to 20 GB in Switzerland inclusive. When 20 GB are reached, the connection speed will be reduced. No additional costs are however incurred.
